column4: I messed up my upgrade it seems. Now I want to install "update-manager-core" but am getting dependency errors. How to debug/fix? Example:
python: Depends: python-minimal (= 2.6.6-2ubuntu2) but 2.7.1-0ubuntu5 is installed.
tried upgrading lucid to natty, fail/mistake. am now trying lucid to maverick.
how are you doing the upgrade? do-release-upgrade, update-manager, or dist-upgrade?
